comment:
* A {@link Preference} that provides a two-state toggleable option. *

* This preference will store a boolean into the SharedPreferences. * * @attr ref android.R.styleable#SwitchPreference_summaryOff * @attr ref android.R.styleable#SwitchPreference_summaryOn * @attr ref android.R.styleable#SwitchPreference_switchTextOff * @attr ref android.R.styleable#SwitchPreference_switchTextOn * @attr ref android.R.styleable#SwitchPreference_disableDependentsState * * @deprecated Use the AndroidX * * Preference Library for consistent behavior across all devices. For more information on * using the AndroidX Preference Library see * Settings.

variables.name: mSwitchOn
variables.comment: Switch text for on and off states

methods.name: public void setSwitchTextOn(CharSequence onText)
methods.comment:
* Set the text displayed on the switch widget in the on state.
     * This should be a very short string; one word if possible.
     *
     * @param onText Text to display in the on state

methods.name: public void setSwitchTextOff(CharSequence offText)
methods.comment:
* Set the text displayed on the switch widget in the off state.
     * This should be a very short string; one word if possible.
     *
     * @param offText Text to display in the off state

methods.name: public void setSwitchTextOn(@StringRes int resId)
methods.comment:
* Set the text displayed on the switch widget in the on state.
     * This should be a very short string; one word if possible.
     *
     * @param resId The text as a string resource ID

methods.name: public void setSwitchTextOff(@StringRes int resId)
methods.comment:
* Set the text displayed on the switch widget in the off state.
     * This should be a very short string; one word if possible.
     *
     * @param resId The text as a string resource ID

methods.name: public CharSequence getSwitchTextOn()
methods.comment: * @return The text that will be displayed on the switch widget in the on state

methods.name: public CharSequence getSwitchTextOff()
methods.comment: * @return The text that will be displayed on the switch widget in the off state
